item.title: The Accountant 3 Hopes Shared By Star After Sequel's 92% RT Audience Score
item.description: Following the positive reception to the Ben Affleck-starring sequel, one star shares her hopes for her character in a potential The Accountant 3.

item.title: Harry Potter: Why Muggle Studies Isn't A Mandatory Class At Hogwarts
item.description: The Harry Potter franchise requires several classes for Hogwarts students, and here is why Muggle Studies isn't mandatory for all students.

item.title: New Stephen King Movie Is Basically His Version Of Hunger Games, & The Film Isn't Even Trying To Avoid The Comparisons
item.description: The new Stephen King movie, The Long Walk, has a lot in common with Hunger Games, and the movie is not avoiding the comparisons between them.
